name: Krenlpha Lab
description:
THIS WAS MADE FOR A GAME JAM UNDER 4 DAYS

STORY:

You play as a LOWER MEMBER worker whose attending a night shift at an underground DEEP lab known as "Krenlpha Lab". The lab was created to keep people safe from the "monsters" which now roam the surface.

Go to the lab and do your work... not hard?

CONTROLS:

[WASD] to move and [E] to interact.
